solution_line_template: There will be {num_members} members and she wants to allow {biscuits_per_guest} biscuits per member so that's {num_members}*{biscuits_per_guest} = <<{num_members}*{biscuits_per_guest}={total_biscuits_needed}>>{total_biscuits_needed} biscuits

Her biscuit recipe yields {biscuits_per_batch} biscuits and she needs to make {total_biscuits_needed} biscuits so she needs to make {total_biscuits_needed}/{biscuits_per_batch} = <<{total_biscuits_needed}/{biscuits_per_batch}={num_batches}>>{num_batches} batches of biscuits

1 batch of biscuits uses {flour_per_batch} cup flour and she needs to make {num_batches} batches so she will use {flour_per_batch}*{num_batches} = <<{flour_per_batch}*{num_batches}={total_flour_needed}>>{total_flour_needed} cups of flour
